job_title: Assistente Em Administração in Niterói, Rio de Janeiro
pros: Possibilidade de trabalhar em várias áreas.
cons: Por ser um trabalho coringa, você pode cair numa área que não gosta

job_title: Professor in Niterói, Rio de Janeiro
pros: The experience of teach and research at a public university is unique. In ten years, I learned more than I taught. The carrier is not so good but you have a lot of opportunities to develop itself and make your part in the society.
cons: The excessive bureaucracy of a public institution in Brazil is a factor that many times makes me think to change.

job_title: Tech Lead in Niterói, Rio de Janeiro
pros: The company gives you enough space to learn used technologies (ruby, java, and growing), and has great people having you grow
cons: Being a part of the university, the company doesn't really keep up to market wages as you grow

review_title: Good place to learn and work
